int scanInt ( ) { int x = 0 ; char ch ; ch = getchar ( ) ; while ( ch > '9' || ch < '0' ) { ch = getchar ( ) ; } while ( ch <= '9' && ch >= '0' ) { x = ( x << 3 ) + ( x << 1 ) + ch - '0' ; ch = getchar ( ) ; } return x ; }
